郱字的基本解释

郱
píng
古邑名，中国春秋时纪地，后属齐，在今山东省临朐县东南。
姓。

郱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［píng］
［《廣韻》薄經切，平青，並。］
古邑名。春秋纪地，后入齐。在今山东省临胊县东南、安丘县西。

郱字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郱； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1273第19
【唐韻】薄經切【集韻】旁經切，?音甁。地名。【春秋·莊元年】齊師遷紀、郱、鄑、郚。【註】郱，在東莞臨朐縣東南。

考證：〔【春秋·莊元年】齊師遷紀郱鄑郚。【註】郱，在東筦臨朐縣東南。〕　謹照原文東筦改東莞。
郱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
郱字的起名意思

暂无。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
píng
The name of the ancient town, the place in the Spring and Autumn Period of China, later belonged to Qi, in the southeast of Linqu County, Shandong Province.
name.
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［píng］
["Guangyun" thin classic cut, flat green, combined. ]
Ancient town name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, the latter enters together. It was in the southeast of Linpeng County and the west of Anqiu County in Shandong Province.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郱; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1273 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Thin sutra cuts [Jiyun] Side sutra cuts,? Yin 甁. Place name. [Spring and Autumn: First Year of Zhuang] Qi Shi moved to Ji, Qian, Qian and Qian. [Note] Xi, in the southeast of Linqu County, Dongguan. Textual research: [[Chunqiu·Zhuangyuan] Qi Shi moved to Jiqianqian. [Note] Xi, in the southeast of Linqu County in the east. 〕　I would like to change Dongguan according to the original text.
